name: Espresso
description: A concentrated coffee beverage brewed by forcing hot water under high pressure through finely ground coffee.

name: Cappuccino
description: An espresso-based coffee drink that is traditionally prepared with equal parts double espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.

name: Latte
description: A coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Mocha
description: A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte, made with espresso, hot milk, and chocolate.

name: Americano
description: A type of coffee drink prepared by diluting an espresso with hot water.
